metrics.name: Percentage of reversed invoices
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were reversed counted for example by the number of 'Reverse Invoice' events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itp_invoice_reversal_events}))
/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Days Payables Outstanding
metrics.description: Days Payables Outstanding - Average time from invoice posting to invoice clearing within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(${itp_clearing_date}) 
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itp_invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT LAST(${itp_posting_date})
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itp_invoice_posting_period})))

metrics.name: Missed cash discounts
metrics.description: Amount of cash discounts missed due to late payments

metrics.name: No-Touch invoice processing rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cleared invoices where no change events occured
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${itp_no_touch_condition})) 
		AND (event_name MATCHES(${itp_clear_invoice_events}))
)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itp_clear_invoice_events}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itp_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itp_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))

metricsVariables.name: itp_posting_date
metricsVariables.description: Attribute identifying the posting date of an invoice, for example "Inv. Posting Document Date"

metricsVariables.name: itp_due_date
metricsVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Due Date"

metricsVariables.name: itp_clear_invoice_events
metricsVariables.description: Event identifying the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricsVariables.name: itp_cd_2_missed
metricsVariables.description: Order of events identifying that an invoice was paid after the cash discount due date 2, for example 'Cash Discount 2 Due Date passed'~>'Clear Invoice'

metricsVariables.name: itp_invoice_reversal_events
metricsVariables.description: Event identifying the reversal of an invoice, for example 'Reverse Invoice'

metricsVariables.name: itp_invoice_posting_period
metricsVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor clearing of invoices within, for example the last year: '52weeks'

metricsVariables.name: itp_cd_1_missed
metricsVariables.description: Order of events identifying that an invoice was paid after the cash discount due date 1, for example 'Cash Discount 1 Due Date passed'~>'Clear Invoice'

metricsVariables.name: itp_discount_applied_to_invoice
metricsVariables.description: Attribute referring to the actual cash discount applied when the invoice was paid, for example "Inv. Converted USD Cash Discount Amount"

metricsVariables.name: itp_clearing_date
metricsVariables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

metricsVariables.name: itp_invoice_clearing_period
metricsVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoice creation to clearing times within, for example the last year: '52weeks'

metricsVariables.name: itp_discount_percentage
metricsVariables.description: Attribute referring to the maximum percentage discount that can be applied to the total amount of an invoice item, for example "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1"

metricsVariables.name: itp_amount_conv
metricsVariables.description: Attribute identifying the amount (converted to USD) of an invoice, for example "Inv. Converted USD Amount"

metricsVariables.name: itp_no_touch_condition
metricsVariables.description: Events that need manual intervention on an invoice and contradict the no-touch rate, for example 'Reverse Invoice'
metricsVariables.value: ('Change Invoice Header Text'|'Change Tax Date'|'Change Reference Number'|'Change Payment Method'|'Change Payment Term'|'Change Baseline Date'|'Change Payment Days 1'|'Change Cash Discount Percentage 1'|'Change Item Text'|'Set Payment Block'|'Remove Payment Block'|'Change Payment Block'|'Reverse Invoice')

children.name: Get an overview of your Invoice-to-Pay (ITP) Process

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Invoice-to-Pay  (ITP) process. It highlights some key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas to investigate further.
Page 1: Discovery - A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths.
Page 3: Analysis - High-level analysis of key use cases
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
For a more detailed analysis of key process areas, see other available dashboards.

If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

children.name: User Guide - Process Conformance checker widget
children.description: Choose this widget to (a) display various activities (b) map the process against BPMN process model

blocks.text: The aim of Variant Explorer Widget is to discover the various process paths. You can display several variants at a time.
Before you start, make sure that a BPMN model is created via "Generate BPMN" (top right corner) or linked. Read more on how to link a BPMN process in section Create an investigation.
For further information, check Signavio Documentation here.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "Inv. Accounting Document Number")
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Number" )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Early Payment Rate
children.description: Invoices with (clearing date - due date) > 5 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > DURATION '5days'
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
	COUNT(DISTINCT "Last PO Item")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Definition: the time between 'Clear Invoice' and 'Post Invoice' is measured

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Definition: Payments are considered late, when the invoice clearing happens after the invoice due date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '1days'
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of overdue invoices
children.description: Definition: An Invoice is considered as overdue if it is not cleared yet and the due date is in the past

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL) 
        	AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Definition: Percentage of cases with events like 'Change Invoice Header Text', 'Change Reference Number', 'Change Payment Method' or 'Update PO Item Net Price'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%'
            OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of ITP events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Vendor Creates Invoice' ~> 'Post Invoice' ~> 'Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice'
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Maverick Buying Rate
children.description: Definition: Whenever the PO Item is created after the Invoice is created, it is considered "Maverick Buying"

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create FI Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total PO Net Order Value
children.description: Definition: sum of "PO Item Net Order Value in USD" (ekpo.netwr_converted)

dataSource.query:
SELECT  
	SUM("PO Item Total Net Order Value in USD")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Automation Rate
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type at 'System' & 'Service'

children.name: Total Amount of Invoices
children.description: Total invoice amount in USD

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total Amount of overdue invoices
children.description: Total amount of invoices with "NO clearance date" and is "later than the Due Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER(
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
      AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
COUNT("case_id") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
	AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Below are widgets based on SiGNAL
children.description: For those metrics, create a widget in SiGNAL to double confirm the correctness of the value

blocks.text: To double check on the results from the pre-defined metric

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Definition: Payments are considered late, when the invoice clearing happens after the invoice due date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" 
        	< "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" )) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"  IS NOT NULL)) 
    * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Reversed Invoices Rate
children.description: Number of reversed invoice in all invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES('Reverse Invoice')
  ) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of blocked invoices
children.description: Invoices blocked by "Set Payment Block" Event and are not cleared and were not removed by "Remove payment block"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES('Set Payment Block')
      AND NOT event_name MATCHES('Remove Payment Block')
      AND NOT event_name MATCHES('Clear Invoice')
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Monthly distribution of No. Cases & cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Month", 
	COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases",
	AVG((SELECT LAST ("end_time") FILTER (
		WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
    - FIRST ("end_time") FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Monthly distribution of Total Amount of Invoices & cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Month", 
	SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount" ) AS "Total Amount (USD) of Invoices",
	AVG((SELECT LAST ("end_time") FILTER (
		WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
    - FIRST ("end_time") FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

SELECT 
"event_name" 
,"Event Created By User Type" 
,COUNT(case_id)
, COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" NOT IN ('Dialog')))
        AS "automated events"



FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Number of open overdue invoices
children.description: Invoices with "NO clearance date" and is "later than the Due Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
      AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%'
            OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Level
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of events : Vendor Creates Invoice -> Post Invoice -> Due Date Passed -> Clear Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Vendor Creates Invoice' ~> 'Post Invoice' ~> 'Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice'
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')
  ) * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Vendor Creates Invoice' ~> 'Post Invoice' ~> 'Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice'
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')
  AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  SUM (
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            ("Event Created By User Type" NOT IN ('Diague'))
        )
    )
  ) / SUM (
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
    )
  ) * 100 AS "Automation rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%'
            OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Change Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

children.name: Automation Rate
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type 'System' or 'Service'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM (
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))
        )
    )
  ) / SUM (
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
    )
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Average cycle time"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Definition: the time between 'Clear Invoice' and 'Post Invoice' is measured

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Definition: Payments are considered late, when the invoice clearing happens after the invoice due date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '1days'
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Monthly distribution of No. Invoices & cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Month",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices",
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST ("end_time") FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        ) - FIRST ("end_time") FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH')

SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "Inv. Accounting Document Number")
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: This page contains experiment widgets
children.description: Serve as Inventory

children.name: No. of Invoices per company -- Inv. Company Code Text

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
SELECT DISTINCT(EVENT_NAME) FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
	Event_Name AS "Event", "Following event",
    count(1) AS "# PO items",
    AVG(Event_Cycle_Time) AS "AVG Lead Time",
    MIN(Event_Cycle_Time) AS "MIN Lead Time",
    MAX(Event_Cycle_Time) AS "MAX Lead Time"
FROM (
	SELECT
		Event_Name,
  		LAG(Event_Name) OVER () AS "Following event",
  		End_Time 
        	- LAG(End_Time) OVER (
            PARTITION BY Case_Id) AS Event_Cycle_Time
	FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS) 
) AS sub_query_Event_Cycle_Time

WHERE Event_Cycle_Time IS NOT NULL 
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 3 DESC

children.name: Types of Invoices from Inv. Document

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Document Type", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Types of Payment Term on Last Inv.

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" AS "Payment Term", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Relation between invoice amount and cash discount amount

parameter.name: Inv. Amount Eligible for Cash Discount in Document Currency

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Last PO Company City" AS "Vendor Location/PO city", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Days payable outstanding
children.description: Company wants to increase DPO

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Vendor Creates Invoice')))) AS "Vendor Creates Invoice => Create Goods Receipt",

	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Post Invoice')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))) AS "Create Goods Receipt => Post Invoice",
        
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Post Invoice')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Vendor Creates Invoice')))) AS "Vendor Creates Invoice => Post Invoice",
        
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Due Date passed')))
    - (SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Post Invoice => Post Invoice"

FROM THIS_PROCESS

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Last PO Item Material Group Text" AS "Last PO Item Material Group", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

SELECT "Last PO Item Material Text" AS "Last PO Item Material", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

SELECT "Last PO Purchasing Group Text" AS "Last PO Purchasing Group", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Last PO Terms of Payment Key

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Last PO Terms of Payment Key" AS "Last PO Terms of Payment Key", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Last PO Vendor Name (too much null...not worthy)

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Last PO Vendor Name" AS "Last PO Vendor Name", COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Vendor by Volume and Late Payment Rate (Top 10)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of Invoices",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" 
        	< "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" )) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"  IS NOT NULL)) 
    * 100 AS "Late Delivery Rate", "Inv. Company Code Text" 
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Automation Rate
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type NOT 'Dialog'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service') 
        AND ("Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL)))))
	/ SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER(
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL)))) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Monthly distribution of No. Cases & cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Vendor Creates Invoice')))) AS "Month", 
	COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases",
	AVG((SELECT LAST ("end_time") FILTER (
		WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
    - FIRST ("end_time") FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Vendor Creates Invoice')))) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Monthly distribution of Total Amount of Invoices & cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Vendor Creates Invoice')))) AS "Month", 
	SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount" ) AS "Total Amount (USD) of Invoices",
	AVG((SELECT LAST ("end_time") FILTER (
		WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
    - FIRST ("end_time") FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Vendor Creates Invoice')))) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')
SELECT DISTINCT "Change Old Value", EVENT_NAME FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

SELECT DISTINCT EVENT_NAME,  COUNT('case_id') AS "No# cases" FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
ORDER BY 2 DESC
